segments.text: I notice the angled view of the kitchen, sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman facing left, polishing her plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But water's gushing from the tap, overflowing uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring down the front, wetting everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing, her shoe soaked through.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a tidy outdoor space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden with plants and a fence, so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Left side, open cabinets with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy perched precariously on the tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand inside the jar, grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl standing by, arm extended in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking cookies behind mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could lead to a big fall or slip.
segments.speaker: PAR
